import React from 'react' import { Item } from 'semantic-ui-react' import { POST_QUERY } from '../query' import { useQuery } from '@apollo/react-hooks' const PostDetail = ({ postDetail }) => { const { data } = useQuery(POST_LIST_QUERY) const DEFAULT_IMAGE = 'https://miro.medium.com/max/550/1*TxgjUE2uJuiRUVVmE_kU6g.png' return (
{postDetail.title} User id: {postDetail.userId}
) } export default PostDetail
